cz.ive.gui
Class GeniusTree

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTree
                  cz.ive.gui.GeniusTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
Gui, Subwindow, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class GeniusTree
extends javax.swing.JTree
implements Subwindow, Gui

Subwindow for tree of geniuses and their goal trees

Author:
Ondra

reload

public void reload()
Recreates the JTree from all geniuses. This locks the Simulation, to prevent geniuses from simultaneous update.

transformTree

protected void transformTree(javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode oldNode,
                             javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode newNode)
Transforms one tree to the another with as few changes as possible. The root is supposed to be the same.

Parameters:
oldNode - root of the old tree to be transformed into the new one
newNode - root of the new tree to be used as a template

getPanel

public javax.swing.JComponent getPanel()
Retrives root panel of this Subwindow. It is not necessarilly this class, for example in case that we use some ToolBars and other controls. So whenever the Subwindow component is to be added to some container, the panel return by this call should be added instead of instance of this class.

Specified by:
getPanel in interface Subwindow
Returns:
root panel of this GUI component

setInvisible

public void setInvisible(boolean invisible)
Marks this Subwindow as invisible. That means it does not have to update itsef.

Specified by:
setInvisible in interface Subwindow
Parameters:
invisible - true iff this Subwindow is not currently on the screen.

isInvisible

public boolean isInvisible()
Is this Subwindow invisible?

Specified by:
isInvisible in interface Subwindow
Returns:
true iff this Subwindow is not currently on the screen.

revalidateSubwindow

public boolean revalidateSubwindow()
Forces the Subwindow to revalidate its contents. This is called when major parts of current simulation were changed (e.g. after a load).

Specified by:
revalidateSubwindow in interface Subwindow
Returns:
true iff the subwindow should be closed, since its contents are not valid any more.

paint

public void paint()
Paint the current state of the world. We use it only to draw reload geniuses, once the simulation stops.

Specified by:
paint in interface Gui
